review: I bought a tv for my bedroom and did not want to pay for them to come out and cable it and for a monthly box rental, our cable bill is high enough.  I was happy with my tv antenna channels, then my daughter gave me Amazon Prime for Mother's day.  So I bought the 3 month Sling tv subscription and got the fire stick for free.  I got the Sling tv to try because it has ESPN and thought my husband would be satisfied with that and we could totally get rid of cable.  But no it turns out he needs a couple more cable channels for his car races and sports.  However, for me the fire stick is great, I watched all the Bosch episodes in the first week.  And the second Hunger Games movie.So easy to just plug it in.  Very happy with it.
